dbr:List_of_war_museums_and_monuments_in_Vietnam
        rdf:type      dbo:Museum , yago:Museum103800563 ;
        rdfs:comment  "There are numerous war museums, memorials and monuments in Vietnam, this page presents a partial list of museums and monuments located in Vietnam relating to the First Indochina War and the Second Indochina War. This list is organized by location."@en ;
        rdfs:label    "List of war museums and monuments in Vietnam"@en ;
        dbo:abstract  "There are numerous war museums, memorials and monuments in Vietnam, this page presents a partial list of museums and monuments located in Vietnam relating to the First Indochina War and the Second Indochina War. This list is organized by location."@en ;
